Package main

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
main.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
Contains all random events that occur during the game.
Version:
1.0, Apr 2022.
Author:
Harrison Tyson

  • Method Details

    • randomBoost

      public static ArrayList<String> randomBoost(Team team, int currentDay, Difficulty difficulty)
      Randomly applies a boost to members of a team based on a probability constant influenced by current day and faint count
      Parameters:
      team - team to apply the boost to
      currentDay - current day of the game, used to manipulate probability
      difficulty - difficulty of the game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String effects that occurred

    • randomMonsterLeave

      public static ArrayList<String> randomMonsterLeave(Team team, Difficulty difficulty)
      Randomly removes monsters from a team based on a probability constant influenced by faint count
      Parameters:
      team - team to remove monsters from
      difficulty - difficulty of the game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String effects that occurred

    • randomMonsterJoin

      public static String randomMonsterJoin(Team team, Difficulty difficulty)
      Randomly add a monster to a team based on a probability constant influenced by available spaces in team
      Parameters:
      team - team to add monster to
      difficulty - difficulty of the game
      Returns:
      String describing monster joining, else null
